description: This file defines and configures a team of agents for financial and web research, including their models, tools, instructions, and a main execution block that performs a financial analysis task.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific capabilities, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class representing the Anthropic Claude AI model.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI's chat-based models.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents working together with shared instructions and tools.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web searching using DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Tools for reasoning and analytical tasks.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for retrieving financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the team's consolidated response based on a prompt.
